enWisdom: Honesty is a merit; dishonesty is a vice
Truthfulness is the brother of justice
Honesty is the language of truth
Truth is the best speech
Honesty is the manifested truth
Truth is the noblest (or the best) narration
Honesty is the garb (or the language) of truth
Truth is the best narration
NULL
Truth is the best foundation (or the best informer)
Truthfulness is the most honourable characteristic of one who has conviction
Truthfulness is the correspondence of speech with divine dispensation

Wisdom: أَرْبَعٌ مَنْ أُعْطِيَهُنَّ فَقَدْ أُعْطِيَ خَيْرَ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ صِدْقُ حَدِيثٍ وَأَدَاءُ أَمَانَةٍ وَعِفَّةُ بَطْنٍ وَحُسْنُ خُلُقٍ
enWisdom: Four [qualities] are such that whoever they have been given to has been given the good of this world and the Hereafter: truthful speech, fulfilling the trust, abstinence from consuming what is forbidden and good character

Wisdom: الْزَمِ الصِّدْقَ وَالْأَمَانَةَ فَإِنَّهُمَا سَجِيَّةُ الْأَبْرَارِ [الْأَخْيَارِ]
enWisdom: Adopt truthfulness and trustworthiness for indeed these are the two traits of the righteous

Wisdom: اغْتَنِمِ الصِّدْقَ فِي كُلِّ مَوْطِنٍ تَغْنَمْ وَاجْتَنِبِ الشَّرَّ وَالْكَذِبَ تَسْلَمْ
enWisdom: Seek benefit from truthfulness in every situation and you will gain; keep away from evil and dishonesty, and you will remain safe

Wisdom: اصْدُقُوا فِي أَقْوَالِكُمْ وَأَخْلِصُوا فِي أَعْمَالِكُمْ وَتَزَكُّوا بِالْوَرَعِ
enWisdom: Be truthful in your words, be sincere in your actions and purify yourselves with piety
The most sublime thing is truthfulness

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ اللِّسَانَ الصَّادِقَ يَجْعَلُهُ اللَّهُ لِلْمَرْءِ فِي النَّاسِ خَيْرٌ مِنَ الْمَالِ يُورِثُهُ مَنْ لَا يَحْمَدُهُ
enWisdom: Now surely the good repute of a man that is preserved for him by Allah among the people is better than the wealth that is inherited by those who do not praise him

Wisdom: أَصْدَقُ الْمَقَالِ مَا نَطَقَ بِهِ لِسَانُ الْحَالِ
enWisdom: The most truthful of utterances is that which is spoken with the tongue of action
The most honourable speech is the truth
When you speak, be truthful
When you relate [something], be truthful

Wisdom: إِذَا أَحَبَّ اللَّهُ عَبْداً أَلْهَمَهُ الصِّدْقَ
enWisdom: When Allah loves a servant, He inspires him with truth
By truthfulness, words become adorned

Wisdom: تَحَرِّي الصِّدْقِ وَتَجَنُّبُ الْكَذِبِ أَجْمَلُ شِيمَةٍ وَأَفْضَلُ أَدَبٍ
enWisdom: Opting for the truth and keeping away from untruth is the most beautiful quality and the best etiquette
The best speech is truth

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْخِلَالِ صِدْقُ الْمَقَالِ وَمَكَارِمُ الْأَفْعَالِ
enWisdom: The best of all qualities is truthfulness in speech and noble actions
Adopt truthfulness, for it is the best foundation

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ حِيلَةٌ وَحِيلَةُ الْمَنْطِقِ الصِّدْقُ
enWisdom: For everything there is an adornment and the adornment of speech is truthfulness

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ مَرْجِعُكَ إِلَى الصِّدْقِ فَإِنَّ الصِّدْقَ خَيْرُ قَرِينٍ
enWisdom: Let your recourse be to the truth, for indeed truth is the best companion

Wisdom: لِسَانُ الصِّدْقِ خَيْرٌ لِلْمَرْءِ مِنَ الْمَالِ يُورِثُهُ مَنْ لَا يَحْمَدُهُ
enWisdom: A goodly mention is better for a person than the wealth that he bequeaths to the one who does not praise him
One who eschews lying, his words are accepted as true
The magnanimity of a person is [gauged by] the truthfulness of his speech
There is no interpreter clearer than the truth
Honesty is the trust of the tongue
Truthfulness is the trust of the tongue and the ornament of faith
Truthfulness is trustworthiness; dishonesty is a betrayal
